"スーパーハード受注許可証の所持"

"Ilma updates <%me> and Aina on the current status of the former Resurgent ARKS. He says that their hearings aren't going smoothly, but he hopes patience will see them through. He mentions that since the Resurgent ARKS lack any hostile intentions towards the ARKS of Halpha, they will henceforth be known as \"Lecielan\"."
